Sign in <mark>Lois</mark> <mark>Andrews</mark> Biography <mark>Lois</mark> <mark>Andrews</mark> was born on March 24, 1924 in Huntington Park, California, USA as Kathleen Lorraine Gourley. She was an actress, known for Dixie Dugan (1943), L'aigle du d sert (1950) and Roger Touhy, Gangster (1944).
